description: This table contains information about the healthcare works errors in the claims information database.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HWRKS_ERR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Healthworks error type.


May contain organization-specific values: No
